Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the incident by stating that TMC workers were vandalizing the statue of Vidyasagar, when in reality, the images are from a completely different incident involving ISIS terrorists in Iraq.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the accusation that TMC workers were involved in vandalizing the statue. The only evidence provided is the images, which have been proven to be unrelated to the incident.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the images are from a different incident in Iraq involving ISIS terrorists, not TMC workers in West Bengal.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the images are evidence of TMC workers vandalizing the statue without verifying their authenticity or source.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the images are from an incident in Iraq involving ISIS terrorists, not TMC workers in West Bengal.
